title: @ohos.distributedHardware.hardwareManager (分布式硬件管理)(系统接口)
summary: Distributed Service Kit DistributedHardware 模块的 @ohos.distributedHardware.hardwareManager (分布式硬件管理)(系统接口)，提供相关接口和功能说明。

sections.title: HardwareDescriptor
sections.summary:
表示分布式硬件的描述信息。

**需要权限**：ohos.permission.ACCESS_DISTRIBUTED_HARDWARE

**系统能力**：SystemCapability.Dist

sections.title: DistributedHardwareType
sections.summary:
表示分布式硬件类型。

**系统能力**：SystemCapability.DistributedHardware.DistributedHardwareFWK

| 名称          | 值

sections.title: DistributedHardwareErrorCode
sections.summary:
分布式硬件错误码的枚举。

**系统能力**：SystemCapability.DistributedHardware.DistributedHardwareFWK

| 名称

sections.title: hardwareManager.pauseDistributedHardware
sections.summary:
pauseDistributedHardware(description: HardwareDescriptor): Promise<void>

暂停被控端分布式硬件业务。使用prom

sections.title: hardwareManager.resumeDistributedHardware
sections.summary:
resumeDistributedHardware(description: HardwareDescriptor): Promise<void>

恢复被控端分布式硬件业务。使用pro

sections.title: hardwareManager.stopDistributedHardware
sections.summary:
